thread.title: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live' - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Lynn Elber, Ap Television Writer
title: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'
text: Photo: John Locher, AP FILE - In this Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks at a rally in Las Vegas. A Hispanic coalition is condemning NBC's "Saturday Night Live" for inviting Trump to host the show. In a letter sent Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, to the show's producer, Lorne Michaels, and the CEO of NBC Universal, Stephen Burke, the National Hispanic Leadership Agenda said the network was enabling Trump's "hateful speech" in exchange for ratings. FILE - In this Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo, Republican... LOS ANGELES (AP) — NBC is enabling Donald Trump's "hateful speech" about Hispanics by giving him a platform as host of "Saturday Night Live" and should pull the invitation, a coalition of Hispanic advocacy groups said. FILE - In this Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks at a rally in Las Vegas. A Hispanic coalition is condemning NBC's "Saturday Night Live" for inviting Trump to host the show. In a letter sent Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, to the show's producer, Lorne Michaels, and the CEO of NBC Universal, Stephen Burke, the National Hispanic Leadership Agenda said the network was enabling Trump's "hateful speech" in exchange for ratings. FILE - In this Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo, Republican... LOS ANGELES (AP) — NBC is enabling Donald Trump's "hateful speech" about Hispanics by giving him a platform as host of "Saturday Night Live" and should pull the invitation, a coalition of Hispanic advocacy groups said.
